      • findTagByName

        public LabelDto findTagByName(UserDto user,
                     java.lang.String name)
        Find a public or private tag with the given name
        Parameters:
        user - is the user to also find private tags of this user, or null to only find public tags
        name - is the tag name
        Returns:
        the public or private tag with the given name (a private tag with that name hides a public tag with the same name)

      • findTagsByName

                                      java.util.Collection<?> names)
        Find public or private tags with the given names
        Parameters:
        user - is the user to also find private tags of this user, or null to only find public tags
        names - is a collection of NamedDto or simple string names
        Returns:
        the public or private tags with the given names

      • findEntityLabelsByEntity

        public java.util.List<EntityLabelDto> findEntityLabelsByEntity(java.lang.Integer entityTypeId,
                                                      java.util.List entityIds)
        Returns all the labels of the given entity: these include all the public labels and all the private labels of all users. This method is primarily used to support indexing for full text search.
        Returns:
        List of EntityLabelDto objects.

        public java.util.List<EntityLabelDto> findAndResolveEntitiesByLabel(UserDto user,
                                                           java.lang.Integer labelId)
        Returns the entities labelled with the given label, but these entities will be resolved, meaning that the dto property of the returned objects will be valid!
        Returns:
        List of EntityLabelDto objects.
        See Also:
        findEntititesByLabel(Integer)

      • checkLabelAdminPermission

        protected void checkLabelAdminPermission(UserDto user,
                             LabelDto label)
                                  throws AccessRightsException
        Checks whether the given user has admin permission on the given public or private label.
        Throws:
        AccessRightsException - if the user is not allowed to administer that label.

      • validateLabelAssignments

        public org.apache.struts.action.ActionMessages validateLabelAssignments(UserDto user,
                                                               java.lang.Integer entityTypeId,
                                                               java.lang.Integer entityId,
                                                               java.util.List<LabelDto> labels,
                                                               java.util.List<LabelDto> currentLabels)
        Validates the label assignments checking against ACL rights.

        Impl. note: it's not really elegant to work with the ActionMessages in the business tier, but it's kept here for simplicity.

        Parameters:
        labels - the labels chosen by the user (including the currently assigned labels if not removed).
        currentLabels - currently assigned labels.
        Returns:
        non-empty error messages if violations were found, or empty error messages if everything was fine.

      • entityLabelListToLabelList

        protected static java.util.List<LabelDto> entityLabelListToLabelList(java.util.List<EntityLabelDto> entityLabels)
        This utility method converts a List of EntityLabelDto objects to a List of LabelDto objects by eliminating labels occurring multiple times.

                 boolean apply)
                   throws AccessRightsException
        Apply or remove the Tag on an entity of the user
        Parameters:
        user -
        label - The label/tag to add or remove

        apply - If the label should be on the entitiy or not
        Throws:

      • isTagged

        public boolean isTagged(UserDto user,
               ReferenceDto entityRef,
               java.lang.String tagName,
               boolean hidden)
        Get the tagged status of an entity
        Parameters:
        tagName - the name of the tag to check for. This should include the private "#" prefix for private tags
        hidden - If the tag should have hidden flag

      • findLabelsOnEntities

        Find all Labels applied on multiple entities
        Parameters:

        Returns:
